title: Interface bandwidth usage for outgoing traffic is high
description: Interface bandwidth utilization represents how much data can be sent from the interface in a given amount of time. This monitor will alert if the outgoing traffic from a particular network interface exceeds 90%, providing insights if there are potential network issues.

definition.name: [SNMP] High interface bandwidth usage for outgoing traffic for device {{snmp_device.name}} on interface {{interface.name}} in {{device_namespace.name}}
